summary: A commandâ€‘line utility that transforms CogView3 model checkpoints (both transformer and VAE components) into the HuggingFace Diffusers format, allowing the resulting model to be saved locally or uploaded to the HuggingFace Hub with configurable data types.
business_intent: Facilitate the migration of CogView3 pretrained models to the Diffusers ecosystem so they can be deployed, shared, and used with standard Diffusers pipelines for video generation tasks.
